modName: Elven Sword Replacer With Blades Sword Katana
summary: Changes the default model for the Elven sword to the Blades katana
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: New file allows custom textures to be applied to the elven sword (replaced elven sword) so it allows 2 different versions of the 1 katana see screen shots for example.

Please read*********************************
Changes the default model for the Elven sword to the Blades katana allowing you to both smith and find normal enemies, when you are further in the game weilding the katanas. This allows both easy access to the katanas and more customisation of them from an enchantment point of view.

(this will use  the default texture you have set for the akaviri katana in your textures file) I do not currently know enough to be able to change the default texture associated with the replaced elven sword but perhaps someday i will. The reason the katana looks as it does is because i have my virgil katana mod installed at the minute for a person without a texture mod installed for their akaviri katana theirs will have the default texture.
Thank you!**************************************

Please don\'t forget to leave a comment and an endorsement if you like!

Any questions or problems please notify me right away!

Please feel free to submit your own pictures for this or any of my other submissions!

**************************************************************
If you like and download please endorse!
Constructive criticism is appreciated!
**************************************************************
author: kirkieball

files.name: Updated Elven Sword replaces texture of new sword
